Our platform offers predictive insights for agilemarket adaptation, comprehensive analytics for informed decision-making, and seamless integration across retail ecosystems. Leverage our advanced AI and customizable solutions to stay ahead of market trends and streamline every facet of your eCommerce strategy. From maximizing ad spend efficiency to enhancing online visibility and recovering lost profits, CommerceIQ is your all-in-one solution for driving growth and protecting your bottom line. Optimize your advertising with iROAS and automate operations to focus on strategic growth.

Learn more about CommerceIQ

title: Adspott
description:
Adspott is a software platform that allows users to centralize and manage advertising accounts from multiple platforms in one interface. The software syncs ad accounts, provides an interface tocreate and edit campaigns across platforms, offers analytics and reporting, and has the functionality to clone campaigns across platforms.

Learn more about Adspott

title: Ad Nativia
description: Ad server solution that helps create campaigns, define target audiences, access reports, detect fraud, filter websites, and more

title: CitrusAd
description:
CitrusAd is a retail media software platform that enables both on-site monetization and off-site advertising to drive sales for retailers. The unified platform combines sponsored banners, brandpages, and off-site advertising reach to connect brands with consumers across devices.
By enhancing the shopping experience and increasing ROI through advanced personalization and targeting, CitrusAd aims to revolutionize retail media through its identity-led approach, real-time performance analytics, and flexibility to meet changing business needs.

Learn more about CitrusAd

title: Agility
description:
Agility is precision advertising--the third pillar of digital advertising after paid search and paid social-- and is eliminating brand awareness as we know it. With advertising costs rising in paidsearch and paid social and a lack of data and measurement transparency, it's harder than ever to grow quickly and profitably.
Precision advertising merges channels and ad formats into one platform so you can control and optimize every aspect of the ad experience for each persona, from first touch to conversion. Measure using rigorous data science methods to finally understand the impact on revenue and other channels. Join the movement.

Learn more about Agility

title: Ocamba
description:
Ocamba Marketeer is an all-in-one marketing solution currently featuring 2 apps - Hood Engage and Adex, designed to help you increase revenue with push notifications, web & mobile analytics, and adexchange.
The Hood Engage app leverages web & mobile user behavior analytics to send targeted push notifications with the goal of increasing customer engagement, improving user retention, and generating relevant leads for your business.
The Adex app allows you to optimize pricing when buying or selling ad inventory through RTB or local Ad serving, monetize push notifications, and increase the overall efficiency of Ad inventory management.
Additionally, you get to enjoy a dedicated account manager, 1-on-1 onboarding, and customer support.

Learn more about Ocamba

title: AdPumb
description:
AdPumb is an app monetization and mediation platform that helps app publishers increase their ad revenue. The platform uses programmatic techniques like simultaneous bidding to maximize publisher adrevenue. AdPumb provides a unified dashboard to monitor impressions and revenue across integrated ad networks.

Learn more about AdPumb

title: Prometheus Platform
description:
Prometheus Group is a leading global provider of comprehensive and intuitive Enterprise Asset Management software solutions that work within ERP systems, such as SAP, Oracle, and IBM Maximo, and spanthe full work management life cycle for both maintenance and operations. Prometheus Platform software enhances the customer experience for planning, scheduling, and executing work for both routine maintenance and shutdowns and turnarounds, all while protecting the workforce with safety solutions and electronic permit to work. Prometheus Group is ranked as Leader in Process Management Software for 2023 by Verdantix.
Prometheus Group has nine interconnected modules to simplify and streamline enterprise asset management: Planning and Scheduling; Environmental Health and Safety; Mobility; Reporting and Analytics; Master Data; Shutdown Turnaround & Outage (STO); Contractor Management; Construction and Commissioning Management; and Asset Performance Management (APM).

Learn more about Prometheus Platform

title: 4flow TORO
description:
4flow TORO is a plug-in software for MRP optimization that helps businesses integrate transportation optimization into material planning. It considers factors such as available lanes, transportationcosts, and equipment restrictions to achieve cost savings. With its composable and adaptable architecture, 4flow TORO seamlessly integrates with any existing ERP system and provides transparency, actionable planning results, and improved efficiency.

Learn more about 4flow TORO

title: StartProto
description:
StartProto is a cloud-based manufacturing solution that helps businesses streamline quoting, routing & product scheduling operations. StartProto seamlessly integrates with your existing workflows.From quote to cash, modernize all your manufacturing processes and optimize your operations with our lightweight but powerful software.
Connected Sales Process - Manage shop workflows by creating quotes that seamlessly convert to orders and costing breakdowns.
Manage Complex Assemblies - Facilitate the execution of assembly across many parts of the shop.
Track Job Progress - Track progress of orders and jobs. Keep tabs of what is in make-to-stock and make-to-order.
Document and Comment - Document and distribute real time feedback and insights from the shop floor.
Track Inventory Levels - Track inventory levels in real time with automated consumption calculations.
Inbound & Outbound Flows - Create shipments and receipts for all of the items that come in and out of the shop.

Learn more about StartProto

title: NetSuite
description:
NetSuite is an all-in-one cloud business management solution that helps more than 38,000 organizations operate more effectively by automating core processes and providing real-time visibility intooperational and financial performance. With a single, integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, order processing, inventory management, production, and supply chain and warehouse operations, NetSuite gives companies clear visibility of their information and control of their business.

Learn more about NetSuite

title: JobBOSSÂ²
description:
JobBOSSÂ² promotes the profitability of scaling job shops, make-to-order manufacturers, and contract manufacturers by delivering a seamless quote-to-cash solution. A combination of JobBOSS expertiseand the E2 Shop software, JobBOSSÂ² has been helping five thousand shops increase profits by eliminating waste and streamlining operations. With an intuitive cloud-based solution and set of native mobile apps, JobBOSSÂ² has all the tools and integrations you need to easily run your shop floor and back office operations.
Easily manage the daily demands of your job shop
â¢ Take back valuable time with JobBOSSÂ²s job shop
â¢ Get real-time visibility into job profitability
â¢ Gain accessibility, security, & efficiency with the cloud

title: DELMIAworks
description:
DELMIAWorks (formerly IQMS) ERP software provides discrete and process manufacturers with a single solution to manage and monitor the entire manufacturing process. The comprehensive solution allowsfor a modular and scalable approach while eliminating data silos. DELMIAWorks end-to-end manufacturing ERP system for mid-market manufacturers increases cross-department visibility and efficiency with comprehensive functionality from finance to production to quality assurance to supply chain.

Learn more about DELMIAworks

title: Acumatica Cloud ERP
description:
Acumatica Cloud ERP provides best-in-class functionality for small and mid-sized businesses to thrive in the digital economy. Its workflows span the full suite of business management applications,and it is built with open APIs for rapid integrations with other critical software. Its consumption-based licensing charges for resources used, not per user, and its future-proof platform drives value and provides flexibility, efficiency, and remote collaboration. Connected Business. Delivered.

Learn more about Acumatica Cloud ERP

title: MRPeasy
description:
MRPeasy is a cloud-based manufacturing ERP system for small manufacturers and distributors (up to 200 employees). It combines affordability and ease-of-use with powerful production and inventorymanagement functionalities. MRPeasy brings together robust production planning and production scheduling, intricate bill of materials (BOM) control, comprehensive inventory, procurement, and order management, a manufacturing CRM module, full end-to-end traceability, shop floor control and reporting tools, and much more.
Always know your production costs and lead times, get accurate real-time data on all items and stock movements, generate automatic quotes and raise pre-filled sales orders in minutes, stay compliant, and expand your use case with built-in integrations for e-commerce, fulfillment, financial, and other business apps. Gain a complete overview of your manufacturing or distribution operation with MRPeasy. Start your free trial.

Learn more about MRPeasy

title: SYSPRO
description:
Key features of SYSPRO include centralized business intelligence solutions with ERP embedded analytics for faster decsion making, depth of functionality in Manufacturing Operations Management (MOM),inventory, distribution, and procurement due to market specialization, self-service, supply chain extensibility and customization, and tailoring. SYSPRO also supports out-of-the-box integrations and connectors, where customers have the ability to integrate technologies such as AI, ML, and IoT into th

Learn more about SYSPRO

title: Fusion Operations
description:
Fusion Operations by Autodesk is a Manufacturing Execution System for all levels of production, giving you the solution you need for keeping on top of production. Gain insights to predict machinedowntime, track production progress, identify bottlenecks and eliminate waste through a fully digital and automated operations tool. Track orders and shipping, schedule and manage your production, all with real-time production visibility from any device.

Learn more about Fusion Operations

title: Global Shop Solutions
description:
For over 45 years, Global Shop Solutions has provided manufacturers with fully integrated ERP software that enables accurate inventory, on-time delivery, near-perfect quality, lower administrativecosts, increased sales, improved customer service, and real-time data.

Learn more about Global Shop Solutions

title: Aptean Industrial Manufacturing ERP Made2Manage Edition
description:
Aptean Discrete Manufacturing ERP is designed for discrete manufacturers, providing tools to boost shop floor efficiency and adapt quickly to supply chain disruptions. This ERP integrates essentialfunctions like scheduling, supply chain management, shop floor execution, CRM, and business intelligence. Gain real-time visibility, enhance job costing accuracy, and improve on-time delivery. From quoting and order management to financial oversight and business intelligence, Aptean Discrete Manufacturing ERP helps you streamline operations, increase profitability, and fuel growth. With specialized features for complex manufacturing needs, Aptean is your partner for navigating industry challenges and achieving operational excellence. Explore how Aptean can transform your business and ensure you're future-ready.

Learn more about Aptean Industrial Manufacturing ERP Made2Manage Edition

title: SyteLine
description:
Ideally suited for midsized manufacturers, Infor SyteLine is an end-to-end enterprise resource planning (ERP) solution to manage discreet, process and mixed mode applications with greater efficiencyand profitability. It is available on premises or in the cloud as CloudSuite Industrial. Both solutions provide advanced functionality to streamline and optimize processes, from scheduling and forecasting to inventory planning and after-market service.

Learn more about SyteLine

title: CyberPlan
description:
Cybertec was born more than 30 years ago from the meeting of technology and planning in the supply chain with the goal of providing manufacturing companies with the right tools to achieve the goalsrequired by the business: cost containment, service level, efficiency, and waste reduction.
Today we carry on the original mission: support manufacturing companies on their improvement journey with CyberPlan, experience gained in many different industries and specific expertise in production planning

Learn more about CyberPlan

title: abas ERP
description:
abas ERP is a 2019 Capterra Top 20 ERP solution for mid-sized manufacturers & distributors. With 30+ years of experience in ERP, we are experts in implementations in industries like custom manufacturing, industrial machinery, fabrication assembly, electronics, and auto & supply. We offer reporting, workflow and mobile ERP for your entire organization, including management, finance, purchasing, sales, service, accounting, production and warehousing.

Learn more about abas ERP

title: Cetec ERP
description:
Cetec ERP provides SMB manufacturers with an enterprise-caliber platform at an approachable price point. Cetec ERP's agile software enables companies to solve difficult problems, manage their supplychain, gain operational control and efficiency, and adapt to meet strict customer and audit requirements (such as ISO and ITAR) in medical, military, and other high-margin markets.

Learn more about Cetec ERP

title: TrakSYS
description:
TrakSYS is a next-generation Manufacturing Execution System (MES) platform that helps manufacturers to optimize operations, using real-time production data and tools to take corrective and preventiveaction. Maximize asset utilization and efficiency, reduce production costs, and improve profitability. TrakSYS includes functionality to manage every aspect of operations, including inventory, production, quality, and maintenance.

Learn more about TrakSYS

title: Imperia
description:
Founded in 2019, Imperia is a pioneer in developing software solutions that facilitate companies' transition into Industry 4.0. Our premier SaaS, "Supply Chain Planning," employs mixed-model dataanalysis to optimize and streamline supply chains efficiently. This all-encompassing tool is designed for demand planning, production scheduling, and procurement automation, while also facilitating the Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP) cycle, ensuring comprehensive collaboration across all supply chain departments. It enables significant cost reductions, minimizes waste for sustainable, efficient management, and enhances service rates, leading to increased customer satisfaction.
Hosted on a scalable cloud infrastructure, "Supply Chain Planning" allows for the efficient analysis of vast volumes of data. Its user-friendly interface guarantees smooth integration with client ERP systems.

Learn more about Imperia

title: QAD Adaptive ERP
description:
QAD Adaptive ERP is a comprehensive solution supporting the core business processes and operations of global manufacturers. The platform is ideal for mid-to-large sized companies within the automotive, consumer product, food and beverage, industrial and life science industries, given its industry-specific process maps and processes. The solution features an intuitive web-based user experience, native mobile access and real-time embedded role-based and process-based analytics.

Learn more about QAD Adaptive ERP

description:
Does not replace your MRP / ERP! TACTIC is highly customizable production scheduling and advanced planning and scheduling software. TACTIC helps manufacturers reduce supply and inventory costs whileimproving customer service. Manufacturers use TACTICs sophisticated scheduling algorithms and what-if features to promise delivery, plan and schedule production, plan material and capacity, and deal with changes and problems.

description:
Visual EstiTrack ERP is an on-premise platform for managing your shop. Create and send job estimates in as little as 5-minutes. Completed estimates are converted automatically into sales orders, shoporders, and immediately displayed throughout your shop on interactive touch scheduling boards. Touch scheduling boards allow shop personnel to see important job-related information without relying on paper while tracking job costing and progress in real-time.

description:
Plex gives manufacturers the ability to connect, automate, track and analyze every aspect of their business -- from the plant floor to the top floor.
Plex offers the flexibility to connect,automate, track, and analyze all aspects of your enterprise. Enhanced analytics provides additional levels of analysis. Industrial IoT (IIoT) enables plant floor production and asset management tracking.
